name: Aqualya arena
description:
This game is in beta version.
It will be a 5v5 arena, where players fights with weapons of all ages !
Open boxes to earn skins, trade and sell them !
Fight against other countries in the realtime map !

Create your country, discuss with others, declare wars, exchange ressources with other players. The game is also a social experiment, you can ask for everything and everything you do is saved ! There is a lot of roleplay, you can join as a country governor ( play and join rp ) or just be a member ( participe wars and events, but no rp).

We need players and staff, both english-speakers or french !

Actual content:
> First skins collection
> Case opening
> Inventories + accounts
> The arena
> The battleMap

> The Community, discord + wiki

Come soon:
> Some bugs fixes
> contents
> fonctionalities

> ios version and

> apple store and play store upload

Notes:

> join our discord: https://discord.gg/4UC5WRteKp
> Your account may be deleted because of devellopement ( u will be rewarded when game is done ! just write "[tester]" in your pseudo ^^)
> A lot of contents will be added soon
> Write us if u find bugs
> Do not use your personal password to create account ! Our database is safe but we dont want you to have problems ... Just create a specific password ^^
